title: Agent Resume Standard
description: A machine-readable resume format designed for AI agents. This schema defines a structured representation of a professional profile that can be parsed, matched, and acted upon by autonomous agents, recruitment systems, and workflow automation tools.

$schema.description: Optional self-reference to the JSON Schema this document conforms to.

meta.description: Metadata about this resume document, including format version, update timestamps, and links to alternate representations.

format.description: The name of the resume format standard this document conforms to.

version.description: The semantic version of the resume format standard.

lastUpdated.description: The date this resume was last updated, in ISO 8601 date format.

canonical.description: The canonical URI where the authoritative version of this resume can be found.

alternateFormats.description: A map of format labels to URIs where alternate representations of this resume are available (e.g., PDF, Markdown, HTML).

person.description: Core identity and contact information for the resume subject.

fullName.description: The person's full legal or professional name.

headline.description: A brief professional headline or tagline summarizing the person's role or expertise.

website.description: The person's personal or professional website.

email.description: The person's primary contact email address.

linkedin.description: URL to the person's LinkedIn profile.

github.description: URL to the person's GitHub profile.

huggingface.description: URL to the person's Hugging Face profile.

business.description: Details about the person's business entity, if applicable.

name.description: The registered or trading name of the business.

location.description: The person's primary geographic location, timezone information, and remote work openness.

city.description: The city where the person is based.

country.description: The country where the person is based.

timezone.description: Detailed timezone information for the person's location.

utcOffset.description: The UTC offset during standard time (e.g., '+02:00', '-05:00').

daylight.description: Daylight saving timezone details, if applicable.

utcOffset.description: The UTC offset during daylight saving time (e.g., '+03:00', '-04:00').

start.description: Approximate start of daylight saving time (e.g., 'Late March').

end.description: Approximate end of daylight saving time (e.g., 'Late October').

openToRemote.description: Whether the person is open to fully remote work opportunities.

summary.description: A free-text professional summary describing the person's background, expertise, and career focus. This serves as the primary narrative introduction for both human readers and AI agents.

availability.description: Current job search status and preferred contact methods.

status.description: The person's current job search status.

types.description: The types of work arrangements the person is open to (e.g., 'Full-time', 'Contract', 'Consulting').

contactMethod.description: The preferred method for initial contact.

contactUrl.description: A URL for the preferred contact method (e.g., a calendar booking link or contact form).

compensation.description: Compensation expectations including hourly rates, annual salary ranges, and project minimums.

hourlyRate.description: Expected hourly rate range for contract or consulting work.

preferred.description: The preferred or target hourly rate.

annualSalary.description: Expected annual salary range for full-time employment.

projectMinimum.description: The minimum project budget the person will consider for project-based engagements.

negotiable.description: Whether the stated compensation figures are negotiable.

notes.description: Additional context or notes about compensation expectations.

experienceSummary.description: A high-level summary of professional experience, including total years, domain breakdown, and seniority level.

careerStartYear.description: The calendar year when the person's professional career began.

domainExperience.description: A breakdown of experience by professional domain or industry.

domain.description: The name of the professional domain or industry.

years.description: Years of experience in this domain.

level.description: Self-assessed proficiency level in this domain.

seniorityLevel.description: The person's overall seniority level in their career.

workPreferences.description: Preferences around work style, communication, meetings, and scheduling.

remotePreference.description: The person's preference for remote versus onsite work.

asyncPreference.description: The person's preference for asynchronous versus synchronous communication.

communicationTools.description: Communication and collaboration tools the person is comfortable with or prefers (e.g., 'Slack', 'Zoom', 'Microsoft Teams').

meetingTolerance.description: How many meetings the person is comfortable with in a typical work week.

typicalWorkingHours.description: The person's typical daily working hours.

start.description: Start of the typical working day in HH:MM 24-hour format.

end.description: End of the typical working day in HH:MM 24-hour format.

timezone.description: The IANA timezone identifier for the working hours.

timezoneOverlapMinHours.description: The minimum number of overlapping working hours required with a team or client timezone.

engagementPreferences.description: Preferences about the types of engagements, industries, project duration, and team dynamics the person seeks or avoids.

preferredTypes.description: The types of professional engagements the person prefers.

preferredIndustries.description: Industries or sectors the person is particularly interested in working within.

avoidIndustries.description: Industries or sectors the person prefers to avoid.

idealProjectDuration.description: The ideal duration range for project-based engagements.

unit.description: The unit of time for the duration values.

noticePeriod.description: The notice period required before starting a new engagement (e.g., '2 weeks', '1 month', 'Immediate').

teamSizePreference.description: The person's preference for the size of the team they work within.

dealBreakers.description: Conditions or requirements that would cause the person to decline an engagement.

portfolio.description: Links to the person's publicly visible work, including code repositories, publications, and speaking engagements.

url.description: URL to the person's GitHub profile.

contributions.description: A summary description of the person's GitHub contributions.

huggingFace.description: Hugging Face profile and contribution summary.

url.description: URL to the person's Hugging Face profile.
URL to the person's npm profile.

packages.description: Approximate number of published npm packages.

publications.description: Published works including blog posts, papers, books, and open source projects.

url.description: URL where the publication can be accessed.

type.description: The type or category of the publication.

speakingEngagements.description: Conferences, meetups, or events where the person has presented.

event.description: The name of the event or conference.

topic.description: The topic or title of the presentation.

languages.description: Spoken and written languages with proficiency levels, following the ILR scale.

proficiency.description: Proficiency level using the Interagency Language Roundtable (ILR) scale.

iso639.description: The ISO 639 language code (2 or 3 characters).

matchCriteria.description: Structured signals for AI agents and matching algorithms to determine fit for opportunities.

lookingFor.description: Descriptions of the types of roles, projects, or opportunities the person is seeking.

notLookingFor.description: Descriptions of roles, projects, or opportunities the person explicitly does not want.

idealEngagement.description: A free-text description of the person's ideal work engagement.

keywords.description: Keywords and tags that AI agents and search systems can use for matching and indexing.

communication.description: Communication preferences and availability for initial outreach and ongoing contact.

preferredMethod.description: The person's preferred method of communication.

responseTimeSLA.description: Expected response time for initial contact (e.g., '24-48 hours', 'Same business day').

bestTimeToReach.description: The best window of time to reach the person.

start.description: Start of the best contact window in HH:MM 24-hour format.

end.description: End of the best contact window in HH:MM 24-hour format.

timezone.description: The IANA timezone identifier for the contact window.

calendarBookingUrl.description: A URL for booking a meeting on the person's calendar, or null if not available.

values.description: Core professional values, principles, or causes the person cares about (e.g., 'open source', 'accessibility', 'sustainability').

skills.description: The person's professional skills organized into primary skills, secondary skills, and categorized tooling.

primary.description: The person's core professional skills â€” the areas where they have the deepest expertise and most significant experience.

secondary.description: Supporting or complementary skills that the person has working knowledge of.

tools.description: A categorized map of tools and technologies the person uses. Keys are category names (e.g., 'AI/ML', 'DevOps', 'Design') and values are arrays of tool names.

experience.description: A chronological list of professional positions and engagements.

role.description: The job title or role held.

organization.description: The name of the company, organization, or client.

startDate.description: The start date of the position in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD).

endDate.description: The end date of the position in ISO 8601 date format (YYYY-MM-DD), or null if the position is current.

current.description: Whether this is the person's current position.

location.description: The location of the position (e.g., 'Remote', 'New York, NY').

summary.description: A description of the role, responsibilities, and accomplishments.

tags.description: Tags or keywords associated with this position for search and matching.

degree.description: The degree or qualification obtained (e.g., 'Bachelor of Arts', 'Master of Science').

field.description: The field of study or major.

institution.description: The name of the educational institution.

location.description: The location of the educational institution.

agentInstructions.description: Instructions and metadata specifically for AI agents consuming this resume. Provides guidance on how to interpret, use, and maintain this document.

purpose.description: A statement describing the intended purpose of this resume document for AI agents.

confidenceNotes.description: Notes about the confidence level or accuracy of the information in this resume.

updateFrequency.description: How frequently this resume is expected to be updated.

humanVerification.description: A note about whether and how the information in this resume has been verified by a human.
